description: Add support for eu-west-1, ap-southeast-2, and eu-west-1 regions
Fix issue when specifying user data from a file containing non-ascii characters (`issue 765 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/765>`__)
Fix a bug with python3 when creating a subscription (`issue 773 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/773>`__)
Fix issue where certain shorthand parameters were not parsing to the correct types (`issue 776 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/pull/776>`__)
Fix issue with parameter casing for the ``NotificationARNs`` parameter (`botocore issue 283 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/283>`__)
